short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that holds all your developer needs in one single pack, improving efficiency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock a comprehensive suite of powerful tools designed to elevate your web development experience. With just a click, access a streamlined menu packed with essential utilities tailored for developers:

AI: Bring your ideas to life using AI magic to enhance your workflow.
Format tools: Using these tools, you can format your code to make sure it is at the best quality.
Encoded stuff: Encode and decode data with ease. 

Enhance your productivity and streamline your development process with Developer Kit. Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting out, this extension has you covered.
